page.title: 16LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: Many leisure pursuits are organised by the residents of Shrawley. The following are some of these:- {Toddler Group Children's Activities Group {Keep Fit Upholstery Class {Friendship Club - over sixties Women's Institute {British Legion Hand Bell Ringers {Bell Ringers Rifle Shooting Club -Rose & Crown {Crib and Darts - Rose & Crown Darts - Ladies & Gents Teams - New Inn {Embroidery Group Woodlanders and Crofters-Church groups {Wyre Forest Branch of The Pony Club Bingo and Whist {Christmas Pantomime - The Bell Ringers Church Suppers, Coffee Mornings etc. {Annual Church Fete
